1.content:
One day you enter the door to your house, but inside, instead of your home, is a magical, seemingly endless hallway with countless doors on both sides.

There is a plaque on the wall that reads:
Welcome! You have been chosen to test out as many new lives as you want. All you have to do to find this place is open any door while willing the hallway to appear. You will notice that every door in this hallway has a name on it. Whichever door you go through, that is the person whose life you will take. Those around you will treat you as though you were that person. You will notice that the first door on the right has your own name. Although the other doors will be random, this door will always stay the same, in case you want to return to your own life. Remember, you are not the only one who has access to this hallway. Meeting someone else living another's life is unlikely, but you will be able to see each other as you really are. Take care, and have fun!

Interesting, you think.

For starters, in your real life, you are...
1.title: Intro

choices: Stacey Richardson, Seventeen Year Old Cheerleader
Thomas Stevens, Twenty-Five Year Old Intern
Rachel Dickson, Twenty-Eight Year Old Parent
122.content: Cassidy walked down the long hallway in silence, confused on where she was. She slid her glasses up on her nose before glancing at her watch. The sixteen year old girl had been walking for what felt like forever, but it had only been about five minutes. "Where is the exit to this place..?" Cassidy asked herself as she kept walking. She then bumped into a wall, the end of the hallway. "W-What, there is no exit..?" She said, confused. "Maybe I should enter one of these doors.." As Cassidy looked at the doors, she decided to pick..
122.title: Cassidy, nerdy sophomore

choices: She Lies To Get Out Of It
1221.content: "Stacey Richardson.." Cassidy read the sign on the wooden door. "..I wonder who that is.." Cassidy then slowly opened the door and suddenly was blinded by a light. She rubbed her eyes and realized that it was only the sun, and she was now outside. "Oh finally, I'm out of that hallway," She said to herself, but her voice was different. And her surroundings were, too. She was now on a football field looking at a group of cheerleaders practicing and chatting away with each other. Cassidy quickly looked down and noticed that she, too, was dressed in a cheerleader outfit. 'W-What the eff..?" Cassidy thought before she heard someone call to her. "Hey Stacey, are you going to show us your cartwheel or what?" A girl said to her. A both confused and shocked look appeared on Cassidy's face when she realized that she was now Stacey Richardson, the girl whose name was on the door she had entered. 'Uhh.." Cassidy said, worriedly.
1221.title: Stacey Richardson, Seventeen Year Old Cheerleader

125.content:
Your name is Zachary Gaines, and you are in the middle of your senior year of high school.

With graduation getting closer every day, you are constantly getting more and more stressed. Not only do you still have to make it through the rest of the year, but you have to decide on a college. On top of all that, you're gay, and you still haven't told anyone.

When you read the plaque in the hallway, you're intrigued. There are so many things you could try out.

You see three doors very close to each other that really interest you.

1. Jeremy, a junior at one of the colleges you're considering.

2. Elaine, a girl in your school who happens to be dating a football player.

3. Faith, your own eleven year old sister.

You decide to go with...
125.title: Zachary, senior with a secret

13.content: The first door on the right, your door, says that you are...
13.title: A college student

choices: Naomi Zaxton, rich spoiled high school girl
Jack Franklin, your own best friend
131.content:
You are Matt.

The first door you decide to enter is...
131.title: Matt Walters, 19-yr-old skater type

choices: ...get back on that stage and dance."
...go take a break. You deserve it."
1311.content:
There's a flash, and suddenly you find yourself standing on a stage in a strip club. Your body is still your own, but you are dressed in a very tight, very short bodycon dress and platform stilettos that would probably look incredible on this woman's real body. You turn your head to get your bearings, flinging your now waist-length straight, blonde hair in your face. You move your hand to brush your new hair out of the way, and you see that you have long, white-tipped fake nails.

"Hey! Gia!" you hear a voice call. Remembering that you're Gia now, you look to see a slick looking man in a white suit calling you over with a concerned look on his face.

You make your way off the stage to the man, surprising yourself with how easily you walk in the hazardous sky high heels. You guess that having this woman's life comes with having some of her skills.

"Gia" the man says to you over the loud music, "What happened? You were just getting warmed up, and then you just stopped. You looked like a deer in headlights. What happened?"

"I guess I just got a headache," you quickly came up with a lie.

The man frowns. "You've been on fire all week, Gia. I want you to...
1311.title: Gia Lowry, 20-something stripper

choices: Take it off. You are a stripper, after all.
This is kind of intense. Maybe you should stop.
13111.content:
You hesitate, but the man looks serious, so you expertly turn on your heel and walk back out on to the stage.

You take a quick look out at the crowd of horny men (and women) cheering you on, and suddenly you find yourself moving your body in all kinds of sensual, sexual ways.

It makes sense, you think. If you instinctively know how to walk like a stripper, why wouldn't you be able to dance like one?

As you shake, shimmy, and gyrate to your heart's content, you make eye contact with one of the men in the crowd. You lick your lips, tasting Gia's sparkly lip gloss, and you wink at the man.

He throws some cash at you, and you hear the crowd begin to shout things like "Take it off!" and "Show us your tits!"
13111.title: ...get back on that stage and dance."

choices: Finish now. Leave them wanting more.
131111.content:
You smile your sexiest smile, and you slowly begin to peel your dress off. Undermeath, you have on a sparkling gold bra and panties. On your male body, this looks even stranger than the dress did, but you don't care. What these people see is a woman. A sexy, dancing, almost naked woman.

Now dancing in your underwear, you start to notice more money being thrown your way. You very seductively take some of the bills and slide them in between your flat chest and your bra.

You are so into the moment that it takes you a minute to realize you have a massive hard-on. You're enjoying this more than you thought. Maybe more than anyone else in the club.
131111.title: Take it off. You are a stripper, after all.

choices: Getting excited for her, and deciding to stay in this life for a while
Excusing yourself and going back into the magic hallway
1312.content:
You enter the door thay says Naomi Zaxton, and you are suddenly sitting in a high school cafeteria with your legs crossed very femininely.

You are dressed in a glittery yellow halter top, way too tight jeggings, and yellow and white sandals. Your exposed toenails are painted white. A quick look at your now manicured hands confirms that your fingernails are also painted white. You can feel that you're wearing a bra as well. You look down to see if it's noticable throught your top, and long, wavy, blonde hair falls in your face. Seated next to you is a purse, and you dig in it to find a mirror. You see that your face is coated in more makeup than a girl this age should be wearing, including heavy mascara and bright pink lipstick.

A depressed student walks past you and says "Typical Naomi. Can't even eat lunch without checking herself out."

You aren't sure how to respond, but thankfully, another girl does it for you. "You're just jealous. Go cry about it," a bitchy looking girl with brown hair says, sitting next to you.

You had almost forgotten how mean high schoolers could be.

You look at the girl sitting with you, wondering what to say to her. Then you think of a name. Claire. This girl's name was Claire. You aren't sure how you know that, but you're positive it's right.

"So Naomi," says Claire, "I have exciting news! My daddy is buying me a car!"

You respond by...
1312.title: Naomi Zaxton, rich spoiled high school girl

choices: Study Hall (really just more gossip time)
Fast forward to the end of the day
13121.content:
You briefly think about excusing yourself, but you decide to try this life out.

“That’s so great!” you say to Claire. “Now you can finally ditch Aaron. I know you’re only still with him because he could drive you places.” How did you know that, you wonder. The same way you knew Claire’s name, you suppose.

Claire smirks. “It’s just as well. He deosn’t really seem interested in me anymore. He stopped coming to my volleyball games, and...”

You listen to Claire complain about boys, speaking up every now and then to put your two cents in (although you seem to have different opinions as Naomi than you would as Matt). Before you know it lunchtime is over. You and your BFF Claire head to Naomi’s next class.
13121.title: Embrace life as Naomi

choices: ...playing volleyball today! We’re gonna kill it!”
...skipping this class. If we go now, Coach won’t notice.”
131212.content:
You walk into the gym, and instinctively head towards the boys locker room.

Claire grabs your arm. “Don’t even try it. You know you’ll get in trouble,” she tells you.

Oops, you think. You guess Naomi’s instincts will only help you out so much.

You go into the girls locker room and start to change into Naomi’s gym clothes, making sure to keep your eyes down. You don’t want to look at these underage high school girls in their underwear. You know that they see you as one of them, and even as Matt you’d only be a few years older than them, but you still feel weird even being in the room.

Before heading back out into the gym, you take a look at yourself in a mirror. You look strange with makeup on, especially this much of it. You can see your dark sports bra through Naomi’s white gym shirt, and now that you’re wearing shorts, you see something else. Your legs are shaven. You look down at your bright pink sneakers, and head out.

After the gym teacher calls roll, Claire leans in and says to you, “I’ve soooo been looking forward to...
131212.title: Gym

132.content:
You are Jessica Randolph.

Your first year at college has been tough, but you've pulled all A's so far. Still, you decide that you do need a change for now.

You look at some of the doors, and decide to become...
132.title: Jess Randolph, 19-yr-old A+ student

choices: This is all too much. Back to the hallway.
1322.content:
You enter the door that says Toby Chandler.

There's a flash of light, and suddenly you're standing in the middle of a frat party with a beer in your hand.

You look over yourself, and you still have your own body, but you are now dressed like a very casual boy. You find a mirror and note your short haircut and pretentious sunglasses.

"Toby!" you hear a voice call. You look and see a very pretty girl about your age, with long black hair. "Hey baby," she says, and kisses you right on the lips.
1322.title: Toby, popular frat boy

choices: Take her to a more, *ahem*, private location
13222.content:
Screw it, you think. This is an experience.

You grab this girl tight and really lean into the kiss. You feel your boobs pressed against hers. She smells like alcohol and perfume, and you are both turned on and appalled.

When you pull away, she smiles at you like you are the most amazing thing she's ever looked at. "You," she says drunkenly, "haven't kissed me like that... in a whiiiile."

You smile back and try to think of an answer, but you don't know this girl's name, and you're feeling buzzed yourself.

Suddenly, it comes to you. Kiersten. Toby's girlfriend is named Kiersten. How do you know that? The same way that you know that Toby's birthday is May 9th, he's a business major, and he sometimes sleeps with a girl named Lacey behind Kiersten's back. You just know.

You look this girl in the eye, and decide to...
13222.title: Give Toby's life a try.

choices: Browse the hallway for a different life
1323.content:
You step through the door that says Kayla Queen, and suddenly there’s a bright flash. When you can see again, you notice that you are seated in what appears to be a dressing room. You still have your own body, but you are dressed in different clothing.

You hear a knock on the dressing room door, so you go to open it. In walks a woman who looks to be in her forties, with a big smile on her face.

“Kayla, sweetie, that was amazing!” she tells you. “I knew they would love you! This show is going to be a big hit!”

Suddenly, you know exactly what’s going on. You can’t explain it, but you know who this woman is and what she’s talking about.

She’s your agent. Well, she’s Kayla Queen’s agent. That’s you. Kayla. You’re a thirteen year old girl who dreams of being a big Hollywood star. Your agent, Diana, had managed to get you on a new tv show on a kid’s network. You had just finished filming all of your scenes for the first episode, and Diana was coming to congratulate you.

You smile at her. “Thanks Mrs. Jones. You were a big help!” Somehow, that just felt like what you were supposed to say.

Diana hugged you, then turned to leave. “I have other work to do, honey, but I’ll talk to you again soon. Say hi to your mom for me!” And with that, she went on her way.

So, you’re an actress on a tween sitcom now. Do you decide to stay in this life for a while, look for a new one, or go back to being plain old Jess Randolph.
1323.title: Kayla, rising young actress

133.content:
You are Kiara Dodds.

You read the sign, and you like what you see.

You decide to try out being...
133.title: Kiara Dodds, 20-yr-old cheerleader

1332.content:
You enter the door with your boyfriend's name on it.

Suddenly, you find yourself in your boyfriend's dorm, with his roommate seated on the couch across from you.

You still have your own sexy brown body, but you have Marlon's short haircut, and you are wearing his red t-shirt and black basketball shorts.

You feel a phone buzzing in your pocket. You look to see a text message from your own phone. Weird.
"Want to meet me for dinner" reads the text message, with a heart and two winky faces. You grin. This should be interesting.

"Hey Dan, I'm going to meet Kiara." You say to Marlon's roommate.

He dismisses you with a simple nod, not looking away from the game on tv.

When you arrive back at your own dorm, you are greeted by Marlon, wearing one of your sexiest party dresses and with your long hair tied back in a ponytail.

Marlon...
1332.title: Marlon, your basketball player boyfriend

13321.content:
"Hey baby," Marlon says, leaning in for a kiss. You must have kissed Marlon a thousand times, but this time it was... different.

"Food is ready. I made-"

"Chicken. It smells really good," you interrupt him. You recognize the smell as a recipe your mother taught you.

"Well, come in and get some."

...

Dinner goes by pretty quickly. You find yourself very amused by Marlon acting and talking like he's you.

After the meal, he gives you a certain look. He grabs you by the hand and leads you to your bedroom.
13321.title: Marlon thinks he's you

133211.content:
"Ready, baby?" Marlon asks you in a very sensual, feminine tone. It almost makes you laugh, but you keep it in.

You watch as "Kiara" strips down to reveal some very sexy lingerie. Oddly enough, you're a bit turned on seeing your boyfriend in your underwear. You'll have to try to convince him to do some roleplay when you switch back.

You strip as well, and before you know it, the two of you are all over each other. You fall onto the bed, and you find yourself acting on pure instinct.

Every second feels alien, and yet, you think it's probably the best sex you've ever had. You fall asleep very satisfied.

When you wake up in the morning, you're...
133211.title: Go along with it.

133212.content:
"Ready, baby?" Marlon asks you very sensually?

"Uh, yeah just one sec," you reply.

You head to the bathroom. You think about the magic hallway, and you open the door, quickly head inside, and shut the door behind you.

"Wooooow," you say out loud. That was about to get really freaky.

You look at the doors around you, and see that you have different options than last time.

One door is labeled: Wendy, trophy wife.

Another one reads: Logan, high school geek.

And of course, there's your door, which would lead back to sexytime, but with you and Marlon in the proper roles.
133212.title: Abort. Too weird.

choices: A professional athlete, maybe one of your idols
A female. Lets shake things up!
134.content:
You are Henry.

You decide that you want to try being...
134.title: Henry Akerman, 21-yr-old football player

1341.content: You start to look for names of famous people. Oddly enough, once you start to think of it, that seems to be all you see. Suddenly, you spot exactly what you’re looking for. Smiling, you enter the door that reads...
1341.title: A professional athlete, maybe one of your idols

1342.content:
You think you want to try out being a chick, so you look around for female names. Once you start searching, that seems to be all you see.

After looking at some of your options, you decide to try being...
1342.title: A female. Lets shake things up!

135.content:
You are Vivian Suarez.

You read the sign and you decide you don't want to be a busy college student right now.

You look for a life that is...
135.title: Vivian Suarez, 22-yr-old pre-law student

15.content: Which middle-aged adult are you in real life?
15.title: A middle aged adult

151.content:
Melanie looked at the plaque. I could use a vacation, she thought. Living someone else's life sounds like an interesting way to spend it.

She looked over the doors, seeing the lives of women her age. Nah, I think I'll go for someone completely unlike me, she thought. It might be more fun to live as a child, or the opposite sex than another mom. Suddenly, she spotted a door. Perfect, she thought, as she entered it.

But who did this new life belong to?
151.title: Melanie Jenkins, 42, wife and mother

1511.content:
Melanie had noticed a good deal of children's lives. She liked the idea of reliving childhood, even though her body would not be regressed.

As she looked over the various doors, she decided upon...
1511.title: A preteen girl

info.brief_description: Pick a door to enter and switch lives with someone
info.description:
You find a series of doors in a seemingly endless hallway. Choose one, and swap lives with whoever's name is on the door.

No deaths
Try to keep sexual stuff to a minimum
Go easy on the language
